title: Eric Jackson: Crypto Bear Market Prime for Bitcoin, Ethereum Investors
description: Hedge fund manager Eric Jackson views the current crypto bear market as a prime opportunity for long-term investors in Bitcoin and Ethereum, citing technological advancements, institutional inflows, and AI integration. Despite criticisms from short-sellers highlighting risks, optimistic forecasts predict significant price rebounds by 2025. His stance encourages focusing on fundamentals amid volatility.

title: Bitcoin $150K or $250K by 2026? Why Analysts Are Split on BTC’s Next Bull Cycle Pea
description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) price predictions remain contentious, but the run-up to 2026 has inspired wild forecasts. After hitting a record high of $126,000 in October and then plunging nearly 30% through late November, BTC is now trading around $93,000.   Investors are watching two key catalysts: the next halving and spot Bitcoin ETF inflows. title: Harvard Triples Bitcoin Holdings to $443M While Retail Investors Panic Sell
description: Harvard University nearly tripled its Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) holdings this year, buying $443 million worth during one of crypto’s worst selloffs. While retail investors panicked and sold, Harvard bought. The timing shows a strategy. Harvard accumulated between July and September while Bitcoin crashed, traders got liquidated, and fear hit levels not seen since FTX collapsed ...
